Designer • Strategist • Leader

I help products lead on quality

My name's Dominic Sebastian, and I'm a freelance Design Director with over 12 years experience leading product design at startups. I help product companies stand out from their competition with intuitive, empowering and well crafted products.

Expertise

Creating impact from first principles to final pixels

Strategy

I've developed strategies to help companies focus, and capitalise on their strengths. Finding the most promising opportunities to explore (and which to ignore) on the horizon.

Execution

From founding product to full platform redesigns, my expertise is helping companies design and deliver intuitive, empowering and impactful projects to their customers.

Systems

I've spent most of my career scaling startups, helping create systems to streamline work across teams, refine craft, and deliver their best work.

Futures

I help companies explore what the future of their product could look, feel and function like. Using offsites, prototypes, sprints and more to visualise ambitious product strategies.

Career

Experienced in AR to SaaS, and seed to series C

  • VP Design, Qwilr

    2017 – 2022

  • Head of Design, Smart Sparrow

    2014 – 2017

  • Design Lead, Digicave

    2011 – 2014

I'm currently taking on new freelance and consultancy projects, but not looking for full time roles. Particularly interested in working with early stage products with purpose, underdogs in the market, and people helping other people.
